titles: Eirenopolis: = the citie of peace Surueyed and commended to all Christians. By Tho. Adams.
author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.
publisher: Printed by Aug. Matthewes for Iohn Grismand, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Alley at the signe of the Gunne,
notes: Running title reads: The citie of peace.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Peace --  Religious aspects --  Early works to 1800.
